page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT IN EAST MONKLANDS
page.content: TODAY THE EAST MONKLANDS SUFFER FROM {HIGH UNEMPLOYMENT.}THE UNEMPLOYMENT RATE FOR EAST MONKLANDS HAD REACHED {21.5% BY AUGUST 1985.}IT SHOULD BE NOTED THAT BETWEEN 1971 AND 1981 MOST JOBS WERE LOST WITHIN THE TRADITIONAL MAJOR EMPLOYMENT AREA, THE MANUFACTURING SECTOR AND THAT FAR AND AWAY, THE SERVICE SECTOR IS NOW THE MAIN AREA OF EMPLOYMENT WITHIN MONKLANDS DISTRICT GENERALLY. IN 1981 3% OF THE WORKING POPULATION WERE EMPLOYED IN PRIMARY INDUSTRY, 31% IN MANUFACTURING,7% IN CONSTRUCTION AND{59% IN SERVICE {INDUSTRY.}IT SHOULD ALSO BE NOTED THAT IT IS THE VILLAGES IN EAST MONKLANDS WHICH ARE THE HARDEST HIT IN TERMS OF TOTAL UNEMPLOYMENT{E.G.PLAINS HAS AN {UNEMPLOYMENT RATE OF 36%. }
